describe.zh_CN:
使用遗迹碎片作为信物，可以召唤出遗迹僵尸，若能用在其身旁击败他，则可获得遗迹宝石。
遗迹僵尸共有三种类型，红色的战士、蓝色的法师、绿色的牧师，他们会使用不同的技能。
战士随着生命减少，会更换武器，并且增加速度等效果
法师无视远程伤害，会释放火球，落雷和召唤小僵尸
牧师会给敌人增加负面效果，给友方增加正面效果，生命减少时。
describe.en_US:
Use Relic fragment as Keepsake can summon the Relic Zombie. If steve can defeat it near it, Relic Gem will drop.
Relic Zombie has three types: red is warrior, blue is wizard, green is minister, They can use different skills.
Warrior: the less hp, the stronger.
Wizard: not afraid of long-range damage, and can cast fireballs, thunder and summon child zombies.
Minister: negative effect to the enemy, positive effect to the friendly.
